sentences.english: The scientific investigation team found many mammoth fossils in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 科考人員在森林中發現了很多毛象的屍骨化石。

sentences.english: Against the new masonry I re-erected the old rampart of bones.
sentences.chinese: 再緊靠着這堵新牆，重新堆好屍骨。

sentences.english: So where we are standing at the moment has got bones under it from hundreds of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們現在站的地方地下埋有幾百年前的屍骨。

sentences.english: And both menremarried before their wives' bones were cold.
sentences.chinese: 老婆屍骨未寒，兩個男人就都娶了填房。

sentences.english: The obvious solution is to disinter the graveyards and begin burning the skeletons posthaste .
sentences.chinese: 最明顯的應對方案是挖掘墓地並儘快焚燒屍骨。

sentences.english: Repairing bridges and roads counted three white beans and burying human bones two.
sentences.chinese: 修橋補路放三顆白豆，掩埋屍骨放兩顆。

sentences.english: A few dry bones of animals bleached on the desert sand.
sentences.chinese: 一些乾枯的動物屍骨在沙漠上變白了。

sentences.english: I will struggle with the light. My bones will be scattered in the wild, rather than the battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 吾與光明鬥爭，吾之屍骨只存於荒野，而非戰場。
